title: How to Make a Burlap and Button Clock

steps.headline: Prepare your burlap.
steps.description: Cut it to fit the embroidery hoop.

steps.headline: Place your burlap on top of the embroidery hoop and fasten it.
Prepare your buttons,  gather a variety of buttons with different styles and color.
Arrange & Sew them on the burlap.
Make a hole on the center of the burlap.
Apply glue on the clock mechanism.
Press firmly on the back of the embroidery hoop.
Attach the hands of the clock.

text: Obtain an embroidery hoop.  Prepare your burlap. Cut it to fit the embroidery hoop. Separate the hoop.  Place your burlap on top of the embroidery hoop and fasten it.  Prepare your buttons,  gather a variety of buttons with different styles and color.  Arrange & Sew them on the burlap.  Obtain a clock mechanism.  Make a hole on the center of the burlap.  Apply glue on the clock mechanism.  Press firmly on the back of the embroidery hoop.  Allow to dry.  Attach the hands of the clock. Hang it and you're done!
